    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_28db4334ba429558b45eaa44f0861e4932d06216</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_28db4334ba429558b45eaa44f0861e4932d06216</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Light reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Reflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion légère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão clara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione chiara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά αντανάκλαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión ligera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that the angle of the reflected light from the plane mirror is the same with the angle of the incident light towards the plane mirror.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plane mirrors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß der Winkel des 
reflektierten Lichtes vom flachen Spiegel derselbe mit dem Winkel des 
Ereignislichtes in Richtung zum flachen Spiegel ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que l'angle de la lumière 
réfléchie du miroir plat est le même avec l'angle de la lumière 
d'incident vers le miroir plat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que o ângulo da luz 
refletida do espelho plano é o mesmo com o ângulo da luz do incident
para o espelho plano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che l'angolo della luce 
riflessa dallo specchio piano è lo stesso con l'angolo della luce di 
avvenimento verso lo specchio piano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι η γωνία του 
απεικονισμένου φωτός από τον καθρέφτη αεροπλάνων είναι η ίδια 
με τη γωνία του συναφούς φωτός προς τον καθρέφτη αεροπλάνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que el ángulo de la luz 
reflejada del espejo plano es igual con el ángulo de la luz del 
incidente hacia el espejo plano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">flache Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroirs plats</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelhos planos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθρέφτες αεροπλάνων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακτίνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
